snippet: A new agreement will allow Nike to manufacture jerseys for retail markets as part of an eight-year deal worth about $1 billion, more than double the value of the league’s deal with Adidas.
lead_paragraph: A new agreement will allow Nike to manufacture jerseys for retail markets as part of an eight-year deal worth about $1 billion, more than double the value of the league’s deal with Adidas.

headline.main: Nike Will Replace Adidas as N.B.A.’s Official On-Court Apparel Provider
